summary: Comprehensive testing of RangeGuard collaborative hunting safety web app completed. Backend APIs working well (75% success rate), frontend fully functional with bilingual support, Leaflet maps, and admin features.

minor_issues.issue: User registration fails for existing emails (admin@test.com, hiker@test.com)
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - users already exist from previous tests

minor_issues.issue: Language toggle (ES/EN) may not be switching all text content dynamically

passed_tests: GET /api/stats returns correct JSON (2 zones, 2 users, 0 routes)
GET /api/auth/me returns user data with valid JWT token
POST /api/zones creates new hunting zones successfully
Landing page loads with hero section, stats cards, and feature sections
Leaflet map displays correctly with zone overlays and legend sidebar
Authentication flow works - login redirects to map page
Admin page accessible with zone management interface (2 existing zones)
Routes page shows GPX upload interface and map integration
Navbar shows admin user info and navigation links after login
Dark mode toggle changes theme successfully
